name: 隨機程序
restrict: ◎必須先修過【AEC8025  工程機率與統計】 ◎課程開放上修
description: 本課程首先介紹多個隨機變數的相關知識，然後探討隨機變數之間的相關性，最後討論假說測試、估測理論、隨機程序等應用。
goals: 介紹隨機程序的相關工程應用。
培養學生處理多個隨機變數的能力。
培養學生利用隨機變數之間的相關性，進行估測或預測。
培養學生利用假說測試等理論，解決相關工程問題。
syllabus:
Introductions (Week 1)  
Derived random variables  (Week 2)  
Sum of two random variables (Week 3)  
Conditional expected value (Week 4)  
Conditioning by a random variable (Week 5)  
Expected value of sums (Week 6)  
Moment generating function (Week 7)  
Midterm (Week 8)  
Hypothesis test (Week 9)  
Minimum mean square error estimation (Week 10)  
MAP and ML estimate (Week 11)  
Stochastic process (Week 11)  
Expected value and correlation (Week 12)  
Wide sense stationary (Week 13)  
Poisson process (Week 14)  
Autocorrelation function (Week 15)  
Final exam (Week 16)  
Term project I (Week 17)  
Term project II (Week 18)
prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【AEC8025  工程機率與統計】
